subject: Technology
title: Microsoft vs Netscape
description: A fast breakdown of Microsoft vs Netscape for builders.

hook.text: Bill Gates once dismissed the internet as a fad. Netscape's success changed his mind overnight.

buildup.text: Microsoft built Internet Explorer and bundled it free with every copy of Windows.

discovery.text: When your browser comes pre-installed on 90% of computers, competitors can't keep up.

twist.text: Netscape's market share collapsed from 80% to under 1% in just four years.

climax.text: The U.S. government sued Microsoft for antitrust, calling the bundling anti-competitive.

punchline.text: Microsoft won the browser war but nearly lost the company.

quiz.question: How did Microsoft defeat Netscape?
options: By bundling Internet Explorer free with Windows
